Disney Solitaire

Welcome to Disney Solitaire, the ultimate solitaire card game that transforms the classic tripeaks solitaire into an enchanting experience brimming with Disney magic! Immerse yourself in beautifully designed levels inspired by iconic Disney and Pixar scenes while solving fun and challenging puzzles.

Step into the wondrous realm of Disney Solitaire, where each postcard recreates a beloved moment from the worlds of Disney and Pixar. From the first deal, you‚Äôll be captivated by colorful scenes filled with your favorite characters like Buzz Lightyear, Aladdin, Elsa, and Moana. This isn't just another solitaire game; it offers a vibrant experience packed with excitement, strategy, and whimsical charm.

Disney Solitaire redefines solitaire games with innovative gameplay features. Collect unique power-ups and special cards that will enhance your strategy. Play now and journey into a land where every game leads to magic, and each victory brings you closer to unlocking enchanting scenes.

üíµ Price

Disney Solitaire is free to download and play, but offers in-app purchases for virtual items. You can disable in-app purchases in your device's settings.

‚ú® Join the Magic of Disney Solitaire ‚ú®

Are you ready to explore iconic Disney and Pixar locations, solve charming puzzles, and enjoy a fresh take on tripeaks solitaire? Download Disney Solitaire now and experience the charm of Disney like never before! Take on delightful solitaire challenges and immerse yourself in a world of endless magic.
